verses.roman:
śivānandera bālaka, nāma--caitanya-dāsa
teṅho caliyāche prabhure dekhite ullāsa

synonyms: śivānandera bālaka—the son of Śivānanda; nāma—named; caitanya-dāsa—Caitanya dāsa; teṅho—he; caliyāche—was going; prabhure—Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; dekhite—to see; ullāsa—jubilantly.
translation: Caitanya dāsa, the son of Śivānanda Sena, also jubilantly accompanied them as they went to see the Lord.
